title: 7PM
author: Birch
content:
Sunset melts in sands
Grass grows sharply and firmly
A desert should have spring

Through the filter, it all comes
vivid and tempting
It’s a story where promises echo

Alarm brings me back
Time to reset then
A desert never misses the sun

15th Feb.
Shanghai
